DOC.brief_title: Duvelisib With Rituximab v R-CHOP Subjects With Relapsed/Refractory Follicular Lymphoma ( FRESCO )
DOC.detailed_description: This phase 2 , randomize , two-arm , open-label study design evaluate efficacy safety Duvelisib Administered Combination Rituximab v R-CHOP Subjects Relapsed/Refractory Follicular Lymphoma .
